title: Fete a Coutances
creator_credit: Antony Barrier and Mary Glasgow Audio-Visual
brief_description: Describes the life of farmers and villagers in and around Coutances in Normandy. The documentary includes clips of conversations between inhabitants of Coutances, scenes of a wedding and of the 14th July clebrations. In French language.
